column4: anyone here with a laptop with a geforce go 6400 + turbocache gpu
shout 'yeah' if you have a laptop with a geforce go 6400 + turbocache gpu
I have a GeForce Go 7700 512MB if that's close enough for volunteer work...
do you have suspend to ram (S3) working?
oops, I mean, "Hmmm, not sure.  Why don't I try?"
is this a laptop? I'm surprised you haven't attempted this yet
Timeout at last - I'm me again
I'm assuming your using beryl - At least your backlight comes on and you have system use
I have the cursor- no visuals
you might need to switch VT's to get the visuals back - try ctrl+alt+F1 followed by a ctrl+alt+F7
I'm also assuming your using the latest nvidia-driver (9755)?
heh - it's not a feature I use much :)
it's usually advisable to switch to the latest binary driver before downgrading to a working one since fixes might have been introduced
but 9755 is quite new
thanks - I usually try to stay on top of the releases....guess I missed one during midterms :)
Any idea on a choppy cursor on high CPU load though?
I'm still recovering from a midterm
this is an issue with AIGLX on nvidia cards - I use the latest XGL from git which solves that issue
you are using aiglx right?
it could be an issue with xorg
